title: Dictionary
subtext: A collection of key-value pairs in programming.
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Dictionary
texts: A dictionary in programming is a collection of key-value pairs. It's like a real dictionary where you look up a word (key) to find its definition (value).
Imagine having a box with labels (keys) and items (values) inside. You can quickly find what you need by looking at the labels.
